movie.title: Buddies
movie.description_intro: In this poignant gay cinema classic, the first film to address the AIDS pandemic, a New York City gay man in a monogamous relationship becomes a "buddy" or volunteer bedside companion to another gay man dying of AIDS. The last film directed by 70s and 80s gay film pioneer Arthur J. Bressan, Jr., who himself died of complications from AIDS just two years after the film was released in 1985.
movie.description_full: In this poignant gay cinema classic, the first film to address the AIDS pandemic, a New York City gay man in a monogamous relationship becomes a "buddy" or volunteer bedside companion to another gay man dying of AIDS. The last film directed by 70s and 80s gay film pioneer Arthur J. Bressan, Jr., who himself died of complications from AIDS just two years after the film was released in 1985.

movies.title: The Land Before Time XIV: Journey of the Brave
movies.title_english: The Land Before Time XIV: Journey of the Brave
movies.title_long: The Land Before Time XIV: Journey of the Brave (2016)
movies.summary: After his father doesn't return from an important journey, Littlefoot and company set out to find him.
movies.description_full: After his father doesn't return from an important journey, Littlefoot and company set out to find him.
movies.synopsis: After his father doesn't return from an important journey, Littlefoot and company set out to find him.

movies.title: Maximum Conviction
movies.summary: When former black ops operative Cross (Seagal) and his partner Manning (Austin) are assigned to decommission an old prison, they must oversee the arrival of two mysterious female prisoners. Before long, an elite force of mercenaries assault the prison in search of the new arrivals. As the true identities of the women are revealed, Cross realizes he's caught in the middle of something far bigger than he had imagined.

movies.title: The Bye Bye Man
movies.summary: When three college students move into an old house off campus, they unwittingly unleash a supernatural entity known as The Bye Bye Man, who comes to prey upon them once they discover its name. The friends must try to save each other, all the while keeping The Bye Bye Man's existence a secret to save others from the same deadly fate.

movies.title: Remorques
movies.summary: Andre Laurent, the captain of a tugboat, married Yvonne ten years ago. She has a heart disease but does not want to tell him. She dreams he quits the job for they can live quietly. One night, during a sea rescue, he meets Catherine. She wants to leave her husband, the captain of the rescued ship. She is a beautiful and unusual woman...

She is a beautiful and unusual woman...
